Method Detail

displayMoves

public void displayMoves(boolean display)
turn on or off showing each move taken. if turned off, will also suppress showing the boards by default.

Parameters:
display - if true, show each move, if false, hide each move

displayBoards

public void displayBoards(boolean display)
turn on or off showing the board (game state) after each move

Parameters:
display - if true, show the board

getAverageRedTime

public double getAverageRedTime()
get the average time take by the red player to choose moves

Returns:
the average time in seconds

getAverageWhiteTime

get the average time take by the white player to choose moves

getCurrentBoard

public CheckerBoard getCurrentBoard()
return the board at the current state of the game

Returns:
the board

play

public Color play()
play the game

Returns:
Color.Red if red wins, Color.White if white wins, null if its a draw

makeRedMove

public Color makeRedMove()
tell the red player to make its move and perform that move

Returns:
Color.White if red loses, null if its a draw, Color.Red if game should continue

makeWhiteMove

public Color makeWhiteMove()
tell the red player to make its move and perform that move

Returns:
Color.Red if white loses, null if its a draw, Color.White if game should continue

isDraw

will this move induce a draw

Parameters:

Returns:
true if it is a draw
